movie-description: A terrorist organization attaches a nuclear device to the top of the Golden Gate Bridge in San Francisco, and an agent is sent to disarm it.
movie-short-description: Directed by James T. Flocker.  With Ron Casteel, Melvin Belli, Augie Tribach, Kim C. Friese. A terrorist organization attaches a nuclear device to the top of the Golden Gate Bridge in San Francisco, and an agent is sent to disarm it.
